short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you [Insert] and [Copy] Emojis. It's Fast, Reliable, Open Source, and Free!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
😱 Welcome to Emoji Keyboard 1999! 😱

Transform your browsing experience with a vibrant Emoji Keyboard Extension for Chrome! 🚀

⌨️ Launch with [Alt+Shift+W] or [Option+Shift+W] (Mac)

🌟 Seamlessly integrate an emoji keyboard into Google Chrome, making it easier than ever to express yourself with a diverse range of emojis.

🍏 Enjoy compatibility with Apple's latest emoji set

💻 Experience cross-platform compatibility

🎨 Explore an intuitive interface that makes emoji selection effortless and enjoyable, with emojis conveniently categorized for quick browsing.

📥 Installation is a breeze – just a few clicks and you're ready to elevate your emoji game!

🔍 We value your feedback! Reach out with any inquiries or suggestions to enhance your emoji experience.

🚀 Stay tuned for regular updates and improvements as we continue to elevate Emoji Keyboard 1999!

It's FREE and OPEN SOURCE 😱

Join the emoji revolution and download Emoji Keyboard 1999 now! 🌈✨
